Package repast.simphony.visualization.visualization3D.layout

Class FR3DLayout<T>

java.lang.Object
repast.simphony.visualization.AbstractNetworkLayout<T>
repast.simphony.visualization.visualization3D.layout.JungNetworkLayout<T>
repast.simphony.visualization.visualization3D.layout.FR3DLayout<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.util.ChangeEventSupport, Layout<T,Network<T>>
public class FR3DLayout<T> extends JungNetworkLayout<T>
Modified from the Fruchterman-Reingold algorithm for node layouts from JUNG- FRLayout for 2D...but modified to do 3D
Author:
M. Altaweel
